member.name: T:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox
member.summary: The following box types may be used with PDFPage drawing and bounds-setting methods. See the Adobe PDF Specification for more information on box types, units, and coordinate systems.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox.kPDFDisplayBoxMediaBox
member.summary: A rectangle defining the boundaries of the physical medium for display or printing, expressed in default user-space units.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox.kPDFDisplayBoxCropBox
member.summary: A rectangle defining the boundaries of the visible region , expressed in default user-space units. Default value equal to kPDFDisplayBoxMediaBox.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox.kPDFDisplayBoxBleedBox
member.summary: A rectangle defining the boundaries of the clip region for the page contents in a production environment. Default value equal to kPDFDisplayBoxCropBox.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox.kPDFDisplayBoxTrimBox
member.summary: A rectangle defining the intended boundaries of the finished page. Default value equal to kPDFDisplayBoxCropBox.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayBox.kPDFDisplayBoxArtBox
member.summary: A rectangle defining the boundaries of the page�s meaningful content including surrounding white space intended for display. Default value equal to kPDFDisplayBoxCropBox.

member.name: T:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayMode
member.summary: PDF views use the following display mode constants:

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayMode.kPDFDisplaySinglePage
member.summary: The document displays one page at a time horizontally and vertically. Vertical and horizontal scrolling apply only to the current page.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayMode.kPDFDisplaySinglePageContinuous
member.summary: The document displays in continuous mode vertically, with single-page width horizontally. Vertical scrolling applies to the entire document.

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayMode.kPDFDisplayTwoUp
member.summary: The document displays two pages side-by-side. Vertical and horizontal scrolling apply only to the pair of displayed pages

member.name: F:Monobjc.PDF.PDFDisplayMode.kPDFDisplayTwoUpContinuous
member.summary: The document displays in continuous mode vertically and displays two pages side-by-side horizontally. Vertical scrolling applies to the entire document.
